Reviews.Title: “Elegant & close to shopping !”
Reviews.Author: meaw_chick
Reviews.Content: boyfriend recently stayed 2 nights singapore stop feb 13 14 2010 hotel charming nice staffs professional arrived 230 am morning front desk staff waiting super quick check pan pacific orchard 10 15 minute walk ion isetan bunch shopping malls restaurants mrt station love deluxe closet bathroom shower stall bath tub selection swiming pool hot day didnt chance relax pool restaurant international buffet breakfast variety selection fruits pastry juices dimsum coffe tea etc price expensive worth hotel lobby expensive cup tea stayed chinese hotel arranged chinese celebration inside hotel morning time noisy boyfriend lot fun collecting chocolate coin dragon lol definitely stay time visit singapore ps mattress comfy aware neck pain

Reviews.Title: “Great choice for short or long stay.”
Reviews.Author: SRS62_Traveler
Reviews.Content: break traveling thailand stopped singapore 12 days play golf stayed pan pacific orchard excellent hotel location short walk upper shopping entertainment day night restaurants stayed suite recently renovated pacific club king reservation included club option highly recommend wired internet free attention detail excellent lighting system office supplies provided fitness center ive seen pool filled mineral water chlorine staff attentive researching location luxury amenities cost services condition hotelroom chose hotel ive stayed singapore hotels past feel hits mark looking stay recommend

Reviews.Title: “Loved the Pan Pacific Orchard!”
Reviews.Author: mikesmyth
Reviews.Content: stayed weeks january trip liked hotel booked pan pacific initially wasnt found booked orchard location allinall pleasantly surprised nice bathrooms huge water pressure shower knock wireless internet rate included free internet via wall jack view 9th floor ok facing orchard nice view facing pool gym crowded mornings 2 treadmills bike weight equipment thats nice pool spa floor gym breakfast lobby restaurant awesome changed morning lobby bar 2for1 happy hour 5 8 evenings staff friendly helpful guys front door able vans 5 minutes location wise pan pacific spot probably stay time orchard towers strange stuff venture night near lot restaurants tons singapore cabs cheap mrt im paid package cheaper options singapore

Reviews.Title: “There are better hotels”
Reviews.Author: Cloudie
Reviews.Content: third hotel stayed whilst visiting singapore bed comfortable albeit checkinout service found unusually strange singapore disagreement found receptionist sullen bad day checkinout desks sat whilst booked slow busy times stayed hilton regent price category travelled singapore airlines overnight stay service stay elsewhere price definitely brighter stay
